document_notes.text:
This update for mozilla-nss fixes the following issues:

Mozilla NSS 3.68.3 (bsc#1197903):
  - CVE-2022-1097: Fixed memory safety violations that could occur when PKCS#11
    tokens are removed while in use.
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: NSSToken objects were referenced via direct points, and could have been accessed in an unsafe way on different threads, leading to a use-after-free and potentially exploitable crash. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 91.8, Firefox < 99, and Firefox ESR < 91.8.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
